description: This file defines the application's color palette and theme data for a Flutter application. It includes color constants in the AppColors class and a theme configuration in the AppTheme class, specifically for styling the light theme using Material 3 design principles.

classes.name: AppColors
classes.description: Contains static color constants used throughout the app for consistent styling.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: Provides a static getter for the configured light theme using Material 3 standards.

methods.name: lightTheme
methods.description: Returns a ThemeData object configured with specific color scheme and component styles for the light theme.
